title: Linux Installation Workshop
description: A hands-on workshop where participants learned to install various Linux distributions and understand the basics of the Linux operating system. Topics covered included partitioning, dual-boot setup, and basic terminal commands.

title: Open Source Contributing Session
description: An interactive session on how to contribute to open source projects, including git basics and GitHub workflow. Participants learned about pull requests, issue tracking, and community guidelines.

title: Python for Linux Users
description: A comprehensive workshop on Python programming in Linux environments. Covered topics included virtual environments, package management with pip, and system automation scripts.

title: System Security Fundamentals
description: An introduction to Linux system security, covering user permissions, firewall configuration, and basic security practices. Participants learned about common security threats and prevention methods.

title: Docker Container Workshop
description: Hands-on experience with Docker containers, including image creation, container management, and deployment strategies. Participants built and deployed their own containerized applications.

title: Linux Gaming Night
description: A fun evening exploring gaming on Linux, including Steam Proton, Wine, and native Linux games. Participants learned about gaming performance optimization and compatibility tools.
